languages.text: {n}Частицы реальности вскипают, пытаясь затянуть рану в плоти бытия и не пуская ее в вашу версию бытия. Вы можете соприкоснуться словами, мыслями, взглядами — но не пальцами. Вы — лишь мимолетные фантомы друг для друга, что вот-вот развеются. Она продолжает молча смотреть на вас, будто пытается хорошенько запомнить.{/n}

{n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Частицы реальности вскипают, пытаясь затянуть рану в плоти бытия и не пуская ее в вашу версию бытия. Вы можете соприкоснуться словами, мыслями, взглядами — но не пальцами. Вы — лишь мимолетные фантомы друг для друга, что вот-вот развеются. Она продолжает молча смотреть на вас, будто пытается хорошенько запомнить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The particles of the reality boil, trying to heal the wound of the existence and not let in seep into your version of existence. You can touch with your words, with your thoughts, with your glances — but not with your fingers. You are just fleeting phantoms who are ready to scatter in the wind at any moment. Silent, her gaze is trained upon you, as if she is trying remember you.{/n}

{n}The particles of the reality boil, trying to heal the wound of the existence and not let in seep into your version of existence. You can touch with your words, with your thoughts, with your glances — but not with your fingers. You are just fleeting phantoms who are ready to scatter in the wind at any moment. Silent, her gaze is trained upon you, as if she is trying remember you.{/n}

{n}The particles of the reality boil, trying to heal the wound of the existence and prevent it from seeping into your version of being. You can touch with your words, with your thoughts, with your glances—but never with your fingers. You are just fleeting phantoms that are about to scatter in the wind at any moment. Silent, her gaze is trained upon you, as if she were trying remember you.{/n}

You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. languages.text: {n}Autour de vous, les particules de la réalité se mettent à bouillonner pour tenter de soigner la plaie de l'existence et d'empêcher Théodora d'entrer dans votre version de la réalité. Vous pouvez échanger des mots, des pensées, des regards... mais tout contact physique est impossible. Vous n'êtes que des fantômes fugaces qui pourraient disparaître à tout moment. Elle vous regarde en silence, comme si elle tentait de graver votre souvenir dans sa mémoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Autour de vous, les particules de la réalité se mettent à bouillonner pour tenter de soigner la plaie de l'existence et d'empêcher Théodora d'entrer dans votre version de la réalité. Vous pouvez échanger des mots, des pensées, des regards... mais tout contact physique est impossible. Vous n'êtes que des fantômes fugaces qui pourraient disparaître à tout moment. Elle vous regarde en silence, comme si elle tentait de graver votre souvenir dans sa mémoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las partículas de la realidad entran en ebullición, en un intento de cerrar la herida de la existencia y evitar que se extienda a tu versión de la realidad. Podéis intercambiar palabras, miradas, pensamientos... pero nunca tocaros. Solo sois imágenes pasajeras que pueden disiparse en cualquier momento. Su mirada silenciosa está fija en ti, como si intentara memorizar cada uno de tus rasgos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las partículas de la realidad se desviven por cerrar la herida de la existencia y evitar que se extienda a tu ser. Puedes tocarla con tus palabras, tus pensamientos, tus miradas... pero nunca con tus dedos. Solo sois imágenes pasajeras que pueden disiparse en cualquier momento. Su mirada silenciosa está fija en ti, como si intentara recordar quién eres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你周围的微粒沸腾起来，试图治愈真实世界本身的伤口，阻止你眼前的西奥多拉化为现实。你可以通过语言、思想与目光与她交流，但物理层面的联结却完全无法实现。你们都不过只是瞬息即逝的幻影，随时都可能消散。她一言不发凝视着你，似乎想要努力记住你的每个细节。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}实体的微粒沸腾着，试图治愈现实世界本身的伤口，阻止你看到的幻象变为现实。你可以通过语言、思想与目光与她交流，但绝不能用手指去触碰她。你们都不过只是瞬息即逝的幻影，随时都可能在风中消散。她静静地凝视着你，仿佛想要努力记住你的样子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einzelne Partikel der Realität um dich herum beginnen zu kochen, um die Wunde der Existenz zu heilen und ihren Eintritt in deine Version der Realität zu verhindern. Ihr könnt Worte, Gedanken und Blicke austauschen ... aber eine körperliche Verbindung ist unmöglich. Ihr seid kaum mehr als flüchtige Phantome, die sich jeden Moment auflösen könnten. Sie schweigt und noch immer ruht ihr Blick auf dir, als würde sie versuchen, sich jedes Detail einzuprägen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Partikel der Realität kochen, versuchen, die Wunde der Existenz zu heilen und zu verhindern, dass sie in deine Version des Seins sickert. Du kannst mit deinen Worten berühren, mit deinen Gedanken, mit deinen Blicken ... niemals aber mit deinen Fingern. Du bist nur flüchtige Phantome, die jeden Augenblick vom Wind verweht werden. Schweigend ist ihr Blick auf dich gerichtet, als würde sie versuchen, sich an dich zu erinnern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたを取り巻く現実の粒子が沸騰しはじめ、その存在の傷を癒そうとし、彼女があなたという存在の型に染み込むのを防ごうとする。あなたと彼女は、言葉や、思考、視線を交わすことはできても、物理的につながることは不可能だ。あなたは今にも風に舞い散らんとしている、はかない幻影にすぎない。静かに、まるであなたの特徴をすべて記憶するかのように、彼女の視線はあなたに注がれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを取り巻く現実の粒子が沸騰しはじめ、その存在の傷を癒そうとし、彼女があなたという存在の型に染み込むのを防ごうとする。あなたと彼女は、言葉や、思考、視線を交わすことはできても、物理的につながることは不可能だ。あなたは今にも風に舞い散らんとしている、はかない幻影にすぎない。静かに、まるであなたの特徴をすべて記憶するかのように、彼女の視線はあなたに注がれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gerçekliğin parçaları etrafında kaynaşmaya başlıyor, varoluşun yarasını iyileştirmeye ve onun, gerçekliğin senin yaşadığın versiyonuna girmesini önlemeye çalışıyorlar. Kelimeleri, bakışları, düşünceleri paylaşabiliyorsunuz ama fiziksel bir bağ kurmanız imkânsız. Sen, sadece her an dağılıp gidebilecek kaybolan tayflardan ibaretsin. Theodora sessiz, sanki senin tüm özelliklerini zihnine kaydetmeye çalışıyormuş gibi bakışlarını üzerinden ayırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Particles of reality around you begin to boil, trying to heal the wound upon existence and preventing her from entering your version of reality. You and she can exchange words, thoughts, glances — but a physical connection is an impossibility. You are merely fleeting phantoms that could scatter at any moment. She is silent, her gaze still trained on you, as if she is trying to commit your every feature to memory.{/n}
